fields.name: Parent Department
fields.description: Name of the central government department that oversees the organisation (or if the organisation is a department, just name it again here).

fields.name: Organisation
fields.description: The department or agency for whom the role(s) is for. Not abbreviated.

fields.name: Unit
fields.description: Where the organisation's staff are split into functional units (or teams/sections etc), give the name of the unit.

fields.name: Reporting Senior Post
fields.description: The 'post unique reference' of the post in the Senior Staff that this one reports to (directly or indirectly). Cannot be blank.

fields.name: Payscale Minimum (£)
fields.description: Lowest annual pay for this grade, according to the payscale.

fields.name: Payscale Maximum (£)
fields.description: Highest annual pay for this grade, according to the payscale.

fields.name: Number of Posts in FTE
fields.description: Number of Full Time Equivalents in this role. If this is one full time post then put '1'. Part time roles are a decimal fraction with 2 decimal places.

fields.name: Professional/Occupational Group
fields.description: The professional/occupational group relates to the post and not the person. Select the professional/occupational group that best describes the teams' function. This list has been taken from the professional skills for government and at present there are no plans to amend/add to the list. The titles are very generic and should cover the scope of roles within government.
